objects.name: Scout Tank
objects.description: Lightweight tank with low damage, suitable for early-game roles.
objects.source_note: ClassFactor table specifies Scout as the simplest and cheapest tank class.

objects.name: Assault Tank
objects.description: Balanced tank with moderate difficulty and damage output.
objects.source_note: ClassFactor table specifies Assault as a mid-tier tank with increased complexity.

objects.name: Heavy Tank
objects.description: Tank with high durability and late-game utility.
objects.source_note: ClassFactor table specifies Heavy as a late-game tank with higher cost and power.

objects.name: Elemental Tank
objects.description: Specialized tank with additional damage and effects.
objects.source_note: ClassFactor table specifies Elemental as the most advanced tank class.

systems.name: Currency Flow System
systems.description: Manages the generation and consumption of in-game currencies (Coin and Diamond).
systems.mechanics: Players earn currency through gameplay activities like matches, events, and ads. Currency is spent on tanks, Warps, decals, and other items.
systems.objectives: Balance player engagement and monetization by providing diverse earning and spending opportunities.
systems.source_note: Currency Flow section details sources and sinks for in-game currencies.

systems.name: Battle Pass System
systems.description: A seasonal progression system with free and paid tracks offering rewards.
systems.mechanics: Players earn XP through matches and quests to progress through levels, unlocking rewards.
systems.objectives: Encourage consistent gameplay and provide monetization opportunities through premium tracks.
systems.source_note: Battle Pass Progression section outlines design principles and reward distribution.

systems.name: Warp System
systems.description: A gacha-based system for acquiring cosmetic items and upgrades.
systems.mechanics: Players spend Coin or Diamond to perform Warps, with guaranteed rare items after a set number of attempts.
systems.objectives: Enhance player engagement through RNG mechanics and offer exclusive content for monetization.
systems.source_note: Warp section describes Normal and Premium Warp mechanics.

logic_rules.summary: Calculate match rewards based on performance and mode.
logic_rules.description: Rewards are determined using BaseReward, ModeMultiplier, WinBonus/LoseFactor, and Combat Score.
logic_rules.effect: Player receives coins based on their performance and match outcome.
logic_rules.source_note: Match Reward Formula section provides detailed calculation logic.

logic_rules.summary: Determine tank unlock costs based on tier and class.
logic_rules.description: Tank costs are calculated using TierBase and ClassFactor, ensuring progressive pricing.
logic_rules.trigger: Player attempts to unlock a tank.
logic_rules.effect: Player spends the required amount of Coin to unlock the tank.
logic_rules.source_note: Tank Cost section outlines the formula and tier-based progression.

logic_rules.summary: Calculate Battle Pass XP based on match performance and mode.
logic_rules.description: XP is awarded based on MatchXP, ModeMultiplier, and WinFactor, with bonuses from quests.
logic_rules.trigger: Completion of a match or quest.
logic_rules.effect: Player progresses through Battle Pass levels, unlocking rewards.
logic_rules.source_note: Battle Pass Progression section details XP calculation and leveling mechanics.

requirements.title: F2P-Friendly Tank Unlock
requirements.description: Ensure all tanks can be unlocked using soft currency (Coin) within a reasonable timeframe.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Tier 1 tanks unlockable within 3 days, meta tanks within 2 weeks for F2P players.
requirements.source_note: Guardrails section emphasizes accessibility for F2P players.

requirements.title: Battle Pass Monetization
requirements.description: Provide a compelling premium track to incentivize purchases while maintaining fair gameplay.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Paid track includes exclusive cosmetics and Gen-AI tickets without affecting PvP balance.
requirements.source_note: Monetization Hooks section highlights Battle Pass as a key revenue driver.

requirements.title: Prevent Pay-to-Win Mechanics
requirements.description: Ensure that gameplay balance is maintained by limiting the impact of paid content.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: All tanks unlockable via gameplay; Legendary/Outstanding artifacts restricted to PvE/Events.
requirements.source_note: Guardrails section outlines measures to prevent pay-to-win scenarios.
